import styles from ".//css/Point.module.css"; function Point({background_image_original, medium_cover_image, url, title_long, rating, runtime, genres, download_count}) { return (

{title_long}

  • Rating {rating}
  • Runtime {runtime}
  • Download {download_count}
  • Genres
      {genres.map(genre =>
    • {genre}
      • )}
) } export default Point;
